name: Load Your Tour Van
description:
Welcome to the Band-Vans.net online game! 

Your band will go on tour. You have to load your equipment into the tour van. With every part of equipment the van grows and becomes more difficult to control. Be careful! The tour van explodes when it goes off the road and crashes into the screen border or into itself.

How to play: Steer the van with the arrow keys on your computer keyboard or with the arrow buttons in the bottom right corner of the screen. Survive for as long as you can and collect as many gear as possible.

------------------------------

What is Band-Vans.net? 

Band-Vans.net is a worldwide directory for splitter vans, sleeper busses, backline, crew and band merchandise. It’s the # 1 place for artists, their agents and managers to find the right tour services easily and quickly.
